summary: Now you can be the same looking ugly vampire as others in game.
descriptionHtml:
Ever dreamed to be a real vampire as Garan in Volkihar Castle for ex.? Now it is possable!


I was inspirated by the raelords "Dawnguard Vampire Races" (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21667/?) and desided to make the same mod, but without adding new races to the game and just adited some textures so now you can look THE SAME as other vampires in game! Supports every vanilla race ang gender.

Insalling:
Just drop all the files to DATA folder.

Uninstalling:
Remove all my the files from DATA folder.

Issues:
This mod affect not only vamires, but also non-vampire vanilla races. It is impossable to fix without adding nex .esp files to the game.
author: JidSaw

files.name: Real Vampire Faces For Player v1
files.fileName: Real Vampire Faces For Player v1-50287-v1-0.zip
